content.detailedDescription:
Lying in bed i always look at the stars
noticed it by the flashing lights thought be a plane or helicopter but went outside - no noise 
staying in one place so filled out plane or helicopter
i was abit xcited i tried to zoom in on phone camera can see it changing colours vaige (not as bright as to the eye
video footage - unable to zoom
i first noticed it about 1am, it's seems to of dropped in height a slight bit (1:36am) 
can still see it.

if it is just a star would appreciate the info
content.summary: Possible star but not seen before brightest in sky changing colour

content.detailedDescription: I found an object on stilts on google moon...Its southeast of baillaud crater....At 73degrees42'01.67'n...47degrees46'34.46"e..
content.summary: Found something on stilts on google moon

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1:30 am and i noticed out my bedroom window something really large with red and/or reddish-orange lights, the size of a car, or if at airplane level compare it to ten planes. it came from the northwest at our home and traveled a straight-line to the east, stopping for a moment to hover over our home. it cut diagonally across our yard, sort of going fast, then slow, then fast again. it was there for about one minute. i watched from inside. my husband went outside to see it. my phone was charging so i couldn't take a picture. my husband said it blinked out when it was in the east. he was pale and knew he saw something that wasn't human when he came in the house. he had also seen the same thing two summers ago i think, also at our house, but then he had seen eight in a row. we had no idea what it was so we called mufon.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw huge object outside bedroom window with red-orange lights

content.detailedDescription: On 01/06/2018, at approximately 04:06 et, myself and four other people witnessed two disk or oval shaped objects hovering about 500 ft, above bear ridge, just north east of the capon springs and farms hotel and resort. these objects were not drones or terrestrial aircraft (unless there has been gravity defying technology created). the objects did not appear to make any noise and was a glowing white / blueish with yellow. there did not appear to be any sort of navigation lights on the objects as would be typically observed on man made aircraft. the objects were observable for approximately 2 minutes before they shot rapidly toward the sky into a low cloud cover. there was no smoke trail or anything that would be associated with a typical propulsion system. the incident took place above bear ridge, in capon springs, west virginia. bear ridge is situated north east of the capon springs and farms hotel & resort. the coordinates according to google earth are: 39.1347721,-78.4720227.139.
content.summary: Two disk shaped objects hovering then shooting into the sky

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While driving west on hwy8 towards cameron  i noticed what looked like chemtrails i  the sky...I decided to take pics to show somebody. after i took them i zoomed in and noticed the ufo lights in them. they were caught on 3 of the pics.. one behind clouds. this happened around 12:30 pm 1/06/18. awesome i think i caught a ufo!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: Taking pictures of chemtrails and after i took them the ufo was seem when zoomed in

content.detailedDescription: J'ã©tais chez moi ã  tourves dans le var sur ma terrasse avec un amis de chez moi on voit bien la sainte baumes !On buvait un cafã© et discutã© et je voit un reflet lumineux sur ma table de jardin en verre !Je relã¨ve la tãªte est fait remarquer a mon ami cette lumiã¨re suivit d'une seconde lumiã¨re puis une 3eme et elle fesait des mouvements linã©aires puis s'arrãªter et stagnã© puis descendait et remonter pour continuer leur route sapelle donc mon fils pour le faire sortir et lui expliquer quand une 4eme lumiã¨res sort de la forãªt se met ã  une hauteur de 100 m du sol et prend la mãªme direction que les autres pour finir par perdre leur trace comme si elles passaient derriã¨re la montagne !Nous avons eu un sentiment de pas normal et ce n'ã©tais ni un hã©lico ni un avion nous avons pensã© ã  un drone mais vu le vent ce soir la et la faã§on de se dã©placã© n'ã©tais pas celle d'un drone!Nous sommes restã© stupã©fait de ces lumiã¨res anormales !Et nous n'avons jamais su ce que c'ã©tait. j'ai essayã© de filmã© avec mon tã©lã©phone mais la qualitã© de celui en fonction de la distance des lumiã¨res ã©tait de trã¨s trã¨s mauvaise qualitã©
content.summary: Quatre lumiã¨res blanc/bleu on apparu ce soir la et prenait une direction linã©aires stagnantes et descendantes parfois  quand celle ci disparaissait une a une j'ã©tais avec un ami ce soir la j'ai fait sortir mon fils de la maison pour qu'il regarde

content.detailedDescription:
1. looking at the stars
2. a light
3. a balloon
4. the object was perfectly circular,no noises, emitted an orange light uniform and made several movements, such as uphill, decide, straight line and alternating movements.
5. i have an active, something like that, a sense of euphoria and calm at the same time, left me immovel.
6. he was in a straight line and i lost him on the horizon, then he went back in a straight line until i lost him again, but a few minutes before i saw him about 500 meters high, after that day i never saw anything again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ball emitting orange light of equal size to a basketball, no noise and i believe without crew because of size.
content.locationName: Caxias Do Sul, Rio Grande do Sul

content.detailedDescription: Vu plusieurs points lumineux rouges oranges qui sintillaient.Vu au moment oã¹ je fermais mes volets et en quelques secondes ont disparus progressivement les uns aprã¨s les autres.Je pensais ã  des ã©toiles oranges ã§a m'a parru ã©trange j'ai appelã© mon ami qui lui quand il est arrivã© en a vu que 4.Aprã¨s recherche sur internet j'ai vu que c'ã©tait exactement le phã©nomã¨ne aperã§u le 24 dã©cembre dans le luberon.
content.summary: Points scintillant rouge orange qui a disparu en quelques secondes

content.detailedDescription:
Was at my daughters in a rural area so not much light interference. i went outside to have cig. for the past 40 plus yrs i've been a star gazer and always look at the night sky, it is dark at her house so i can really see the stars, i was looking to the nw at about 30 degrees and thought it was a star and kept looking at it trying to determine what star / planet it might be. ( orion was behind me in se at about 70 degrees ) it just looked like a star but then it started making slight movements, up and down, side to side and little loop-de-loops i watched for about 10 min. and thought my eyes where playing tricks so i called my son-in-law out to see if he saw the same thing. yes, he did ! we both continued to watch the movements for at least another 30 min. tried to video it but was to dark out to capture anything.
 
 i have no idea how far away it was or how many miles above the earth it was, so what seemed like slight movements to us, may well have been huge maneuvers.  we were finally driven inside frozen by the cold.
content.summary: Star ? ( like ) that stayed in about the same spot in the night sky but went up and down, side to side, it was very far away so these movements seemed very slight but noticeable

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dogs out to use the bathroom.  it was right before 7am, so still dark out in january.  i have a passion for looking at stars and the night sky, so i always look up and attempt to view stars and figure out which ones they are.  when i looked up, i saw a very bright large star.  i continued to stare at it because it was so large, i didn't know what star it could be.  then it blinked once and faster than anything i've ever seen, shot back up into space.  i stood, baffled, staring at the sky in the frigid cold january air for 10 minutes.  my eyes were glued to the sky.  i have no idea what this was and would love for someone to tell me.  it wasn't an airplane, it wasn't a satellite, it wasn't a shooting star, meteor, or comet!!  please, what could this have been?  otherwise, i'm convinced, i saw a ufo!
content.summary: I looked up in the sky because i saw a very large bright white light.  i watched it for a few seconds because i was trying to figure out which star it was or verify it was an airplane.  then, it blinked once,  and went back into space.

content.detailedDescription:
This photo was taken before boarding the flight back home on the above date and only noticed the object in the background sky above the plane when looking at the pictures back home as my focus was on the plane at the time. i'm presuming it's probably a meteorite but always wondered as it does appear to have a solid structure next to the light but this could just be a vapour trail or something?

i did send it somewhere else about 10 years ago but never heard anything back and the recent boom in ufo related events reminded me of this. so will let you have a look and see what you think.

thanks,

paul
content.summary: Possible meteorite or ufo?

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to work and my first turn was down a hill (my city is in a river valley).  i saw these three bright lights in the sky not much higher than my current elevation.  i drove down the hill and pulled off at a conveinent place and took out my cell phone.  i believe it was a iphone 4s.  i began to record these slow moving objects.  i propped my cellphone on the hood of my truck so the images wouldn't be too shakey (i do believe in ufos and i hate shakey videos). anyway.  i saw what looked like a police car (gonzaga university police) was my first thought.  i was at a new construction site and having worked the us census in 2010 i knew these guys were no fun to deal with and cut my video because there was an arson fire at a previous build.  anyway, i left.  i was hoping to catch the lights again on a bridge over a valley on my way to work (which would have been amazing).  but, i never saw the slow moving lights again. i want to add i have about 10 years in security and was on my way to work at an airport.  these lights were not on any flight path i have ever seen (they mostly fly just north of my house).  i believe this is the exact date.  i am using my cellphones date / time stamp.
content.summary: 3 very unusual lights on my way to work.

content.detailedDescription: It was a light i could see in the sky- it looked like an airplane but it was moving really weird. wiggling around like a drone, but there wouldn't be any one messing with lighted drones in this remote area at 3 in the morning  on the coldest night of the year!
content.summary: A light in the sky that looked like an airplane, but it wiggled around going in a lot of strange directions an airplane can't go.

content.detailedDescription:
Forgive me for waiting so long to come out with this but this event is somewhat fresh in my mind the way it played out and with all that is going on in the world, it just seemed like ti should reveal this story.

i was with a handful of friends at a friends house located directly across the street from a large department store.
my friends began playing a drinking game and i had no desire to drink so i decided to go outside and sit on the porch and have a cigarette. my view consisted of a large empty parking lot with one or two randomly parked cars, multiple street lights and no sign of human activity but not too late at night. (think of a target store parking lot way after it's closed but all lights are on).

i'm not sure if the object appeared or just approached me but out of nowhere i see 3 glowing red lights in the shape of a triangle flying directly towards me but not at me if you get what i mean.
at the moment i realized what i was seeing (a ufo) i was so excited i jumped up (slowly) and took a couple of steps off the porch and stepped onto the sidewalk to get a better look.
then, i immediately noticed 2 to 4 dozen small "tinker bell" sized (and equal in brightness) shaped orbs randomly rotating in no specific order around the outside of the triangle aircraft. and as the object approached closer i also noticed there was no exhaust or sound of propulsion but i could hear the tinker bell orbs that enclosed the triangle sound like streaks and pops of electricity. also, the triangle aircraft seemed to glide and not fly. as it flew directly over me and i realized my mouth was wide open in awe, i quickly ran back to the house about ten feet away and began pounding on a very large front window to get my best friends attention inside. my friend came out moments later like wtf dude? i replied that i just saw a ufo that flew towards me and i lost sight of it behind the house. he laughed at me and told everyone inside that i just saw a ufo and they all laughed too. one friend believed me and we immediately ran to the backyard to see where it went but the sky was empty by then, maybe 2-3 minutes later.

 i don't think this as "aliens" but more military tech that was alien like. 
it started at a 45 degree angle relative to my view, directly above the department store and flew directly over me to behind the house where my view became obstructed by trees and houses. one thing i noticed that was strange as well was the fact that one of the only two cars in the empty parking lot was a black suv that i swear i could see an alfred hitchcock like silhouette of a person. i assumed it was abandoned but after the object left, the suv soon followed.

i became very intrigued in what i saw and began searching youtube for similar sightings. what i soon learned is that the object i may have saw could have been the us gov't astra tr-3b. however in every captured video, only a few show 3 red lights, almost all have a fourth light in the center that glows and absolutely none of the videos showed evidence of the 2-4 dozen tinker bell like objects that surrounded the object which i saw. i am strongly convinced that what i witnessed was anti-gravity technology being tested. this happened almost 20 years ago so i my dates aren't exact but i do believe this technology is almost elementary by now.
content.summary: Triangle object w/ 25 to 50 tinkerbell like white orbs resembling a force field around the craft.

content.detailedDescription: my husband and i were walking outside our apartments to go do laundry. i saw a bright fiery light coming towards us (north) in the night sky.  it was overcast and this was the only light in the sky.  it almost looks like a helicopter that was on fire that was flying really low.  it got brighter as it came closer.  my husband thought that it was a meteor but it was moving too slow.  it quickly changed directions and started going north east.  then it suddenly just stopped, and hovered in the same spot for about 35 to 45 seconds.  then it went straight up, and just disappeared.  it didn’t make any kind of noise or sound at all.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orange  firey light slowly heading northwest, then stopped hovered, went  straight up and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: At 4:10 i open my window for some fresh air and i saw something hovering and then i looked to my left and i saw another 3 ufo hovering and  i l just blue and white flickering every where going back a while my brother spotted a ufo and he reported it
content.summary: Got up at 4:10 in the morning just to get a bit of fresh air look up in the sky i saw it just hovering about then i looked to the left and there was 3 more

content.detailedDescription: Was walking dog on beach and looked up at stars. noticed a very bright one, that seemed to be moving. watched it go up, down diagonal, side to side.Watched for about 20 minutes. went inside, balcony overlooks the beach in north myrtle near long bay. looked out and could still see it moving. told husband who confirmed same. it was extremely cold, so i kept going in and out. noticed a couple of planes in the sky but what stood out was a rather low flying one about two hours in. it seemed to get a little closer and could see shape vs. just looking like a star moving in various directions. sometimes it. over slowly, other times more quickly. wasn't close enough to see clearly but could sort of see a diamond or triangular shape. the movement wasn't like a plane that travels in a forward path, or a helicopter. it seemed to be in a certain area, just to the right of 3 stars aligned vertically. checked multiple times, as did husband.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw bright object that moved in different directions, 2-3 hours, got larger looked triangular, husband saw it too,

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming out of the door at my job to make a phone call and smoke. i saw a jet trail in the sky, and it was glowing, and it was dark out. it stretched, then plumed, then multiple explosions were going at the front and rear of where the north south stretching jet line originated.
i began yelling for people to look at the sky, in a parking lot , very busy, and no one would look up, with a 2 exceptions. my coworker heard me yelling, thinking i was fighting with someone? and he began filming, he googled what it was, elon musks rocket re entering the atmosphere, so, there you have it. i have the photos.
there was a lot going on , can't be more specific, and i had to go back to work, saw nothing depart, i observed for 40 minutes, and as i left the explosions had ended, and smoke in a plume that looked like a giant whale shaped mother ship kept glowing 100 times the size of the many lights moving around in no succession, or pattern.
content.summary: Elon musk rocket came into orbit. as we were filming we didn't notice the alien lights weren't apart of rocket until looking at photos later

content.detailedDescription: Approximately two years ago i submitted a sighting and an investigator contacted me.  unfortunately i do not recall the investigators name.  if i remember i believe he lived in the st. leonard municipality of montreal, quebec canada.  after interviewing me he invited me to train as an investigator.  the timing was not convenient and i told him that i would consider it.  i would like to review the possibility at this time to explore the opportunity.  the best time to reach me the week of january 8 to 13 2018 are after 15:00hrs monday and tuesday january 8 and 9 or any time after 09:00 wednesday to saturday january 10 -13 2018.  thank you.
content.summary: Noticed the light approximately six to ten miles away and followed it to the source then observed for about half an hour,

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv at 12:32 am and i looked out my window towards the southern skyped in pacifica ca. and i saw two lights in the sky. i took pictures from inside and then i went outside to take pictures as well. they stayed for about 3 minutes and disappeared. about 10 minutes later one showed up for 30-45 seconds then left.
content.summary: Saw two lights off set from each other

content.detailedDescription: 12/31/1989 age 10 went out to feed my dog who was at the bottom of my yard about 50 feet from my house.First stopped to feed and water the rabbits in the pen, looked off to my right and there was a flourescent green glowing ball in the sky at treetop level just hovering.I stood in shock and watched it for a minute then proceeded to walk to the dogpen and after about 5 steps,this thing started shooting flourescent green beams in my direction.So i dropped what i had and ran for the house and told my mom,she ran outside and saw this thing shooting beams.We both went back in the house and i was hysterical.My dad wouldnt go out and look but about 30 mins after we observed it,it was gogonafter that i would have these dreams that i was being sucked out of my own body and floating thru the air.Anyways,6 months later i have this lump appear on my leg,i go to the drs and they said it was some kind of growth and i had it removed.It was sent away for biopsy and the report came back that the skin was imbedded with an unidentifiable metal and would need to go thru further testing but i was a minor and left it alone. i ofter have dreams to this day tjat paralyze my body and i feel as tho im going thru astral projection.Over the years my mother and i have seen many more ufos and we both suffer from odd medical conditions.
content.summary: Fluorescent green ball emitting same color beams in my direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was just falling asleep when they came in through the second door which leads to the front yard.I didn't see any object but the 'men' wore good-looking,were like clones,wore silver suites and carried bubble-like helmets at their side. i fell into a trance-like state then fell asleep.The next morning i was wet with sweat and my ejaculation.I forgot about this incident for years until i saw a photo of nichelle nichols(lt.Uhura from star trek)in astronomy magazine modeling the newest astronaut suit complete with helmet.I swear this is the truth as well as i can remember and if this offends anybody i can understand it but i make no apologies,heck i am gay.I am just guessing what the object might have looked like by the way.Thankyou for your time,anthony.
content.summary: They were adult males,good-looking,dressed in silver suites and got in bed with me

content.detailedDescription: Cigar shaped objects found after reviewing photo sequences. location: san lorenzo, puerto rico. time:sat jan 06 2018 11:10:29 am and 11:12:13 am puerto rico time. a family member told me he saw strange red lights hovering and going away from that hill late night a couple of days ago. so i decided to take photos pointing to that same hill during the day.
content.summary: Cigar shaped objects found after reviewing photo sequences.

content.detailedDescription:
Sightings occurred multiple times, western to nw sky, winter primarily. my friends &i go out onto gettysburg battlefield at dark, in the ‘legal’ locations(after dark most of natnl park closed.We went to just hangout and talk.  we often climbed metal stairs of one of the battlefield towers and rest against railing and talk. on multiple occasions i noticed a light, moving around like a bee/randomly(around 8pm to midnight-depending when we arrived on battlefield.  it caught my attention b/c it was much brighter than a star,&completely quiet-so i didn’t think it was a helicopter or planet or star. it sorta hovered around the same area, always westward upon initial sightings, and slowly might meanderslightly north. although i pointed it out to friends and asked their opinion on what it might be, i was seemingly the only curious person.Frustrating! i had also noticed similar light multiple times when i was alone, too. 
so that pretty much it.  i was about 14-20y old when i’d have these sightings—always night, always westward etc always one starlike entity etceverything same.  if i didn’t have eyesight i would never have noticed anything there.
iits funny but i don’t remember how or when i’d lose sight of them.  i wish i knew someone else who noticed them too. as far as emotions..Mainly curiosity and wonderment...And alone cuz i seemed to be the only person that was ‘noticing ‘them and curious!
content.summary: Happene>1x, over 3y period,very silent movingrandomly like a bug

content.detailedDescription: Contact me for information
content.summary: Round massive 4 coulerd lights lightning black

content.detailedDescription:
Dans la nuit du 24 au 25 dã©cembre. quittant le rã©veillon de noã«l passã© chez ma mã¨re en avignon, je rentrais chez moi ã  lauris.
j'ã©tais en train de conduire  sur la "route dâ€™avignon" aux abords de cavaillon, lorsque je vis dans le ciel trois boules orangã©es.
je me suis alors dit: "tiens qu'est-ce que c'est? ce ne sont pas des ã©toiles c'est bien trop gros!" a ce moment lã  j'ã©tais ã  2km du point de croisement et les boules ã©taient alignã©es en ligne quasi droite:
o  o  o
tout en avanã§ant droit dans leur direction et en excluant complã¨tement les possibilitã©s d'avions, de fusã©es ã©clairantes. les 3 boules se sont dã©placã©es de maniã¨re ã  former un triangle isocã¨les.
  o
o   o 
puis la distances entre ces trois lumiã¨res s'est agrandi.
    o

       o
o
me rapprochant de plus en plus, une premiã¨re lumiã¨res a disparu d'une maniã¨re particuliã¨re. c'ã©tait comme si la lumiã¨re fondã©e dans le ciel. puis une seconde lumiã¨re a disparue. 
il ne restait plus qu'une lumiã¨re stationnaire. 
je pouvais la voir, sans ãªtre certaine de sa distance mais je voyais bien  que ce n'ã©tait pas une lanterne chinoises. on peu en apercevoir plusieurs durant cette pã©riode et ã§a n'avait ni les mãªmes dã©placements, ni la mãªme intensitã©. de plus les lanternes ont, ce que j'appelle, un "battement" de flamme. 
lã  c'ã©tait une lumiã¨re vive et continue.
puis, je suis passã© dessous en voiture. ce qui m'a permit de constater que l'objet ã©tait bien lumineux sur toute la surface de la sphã¨re.
je n'arrivais pas ã  l'expliquer. 

je continuais ã  avancer en voyant la boule dans mon rã©troviseur, puis j'ai bien du regarder la route devant moi. lorsque j'ai regardã© dans le rã©tro de nouveau (quelques seconde aprã¨s), je la perdais simplement de vue.

aujourd'hui je ne sais pas si c'ã©tait pas manque de courage ou obnubilã© par mes questions au point de continuer, mais je regrette de ne pas m'ãªtre arrãªtã©. ã‡a bougeait tellement devant moi, que j'ã©tais concentrã©e sur le sens de cette apparition. 

j'ai bien mis 5 min avant de rã©aliser complã¨tement que je ne pouvais vraiment pas l'expliquer. pour moi c'ã©tait des ovnis dans le sens que je n'ai pu les identifier.

le lendemain j'en parle ã  ma belle så“ur trã¨s rapidement, qui me dit: "mon amie **** les a vue aussi !"
j'ai cherchã© sur internet et vu 2 tã©moignages ressemblant au mien, l'un ã  vedã¨ne, l'autre ã  lâ€™ile-sur-sorgues.
aujourd'hui mon frã¨re m'a envoyã© le lien de l'article de la provence dans lequel on parlait de boules jaunes-orangã©es aperã§ues dans luberon dans la nuit du 24 dã©cembre. avec en bas de page un lien vers le mufon.

je n'ai pas d'image de lâ€™ã©vã©nement, je conduisais.
mais je vous envoi en image jointe la situation gã©ographique de l'ã©vã©nement.
content.summary: Apparition de 3 boules lumineuses orangã©es au dessus de cavaillon

content.detailedDescription:
Having set my ironing board up in my bedroom,i was on a mission to clear a mountain of laundry,not much was done after this ufo passed by.
after only pressing 1 tee shirt, i was in the process of turning another inside out to continue the ironing marathon,and to enjoy watching a video on my phone that was sitting on the window sill.

taking in a rather nice view,clearing sky and the sun lurking somewhere,something approaching from my right hand side grabbed my attention.

having had a previous sighting of an orb like object very recently,this was something i quickly recognised and switched my phone to camera mode to capture an image of which i have 3 and was able to record video of the object moving away into cloud cover.
this object was to my eye an orb of some type,appearing metallic and polished,however,changing shape as it moved through the air,but could this be the result of reflecting clouds on its surface.

the object appeared to be moving in a tumbling fashion through the air,as if rolling over and over,rather than travelling steady and on a fixed trajectory.

it was moving with purpose and considerable momentum,at first appearance as if coming directly across my viewing point from my window,but as my video shows,it was moving away in a westerly direction.
the video clip shows the object appearing for around 8 seconds before going into the cloud cover.
throughout the footage the object is tumbling and appears as a darker object rather than as first viewed being bright and metallic.
object disappeared into cloud cover.
content.summary: Metallic orb tumbling through the air,travelling at speed.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw my friend post this video on snapchat and it stuck out to me because i know the area and there is no other possible object that is that bright and it was flashing in a patter and when i slowed the video down the light is round and very bright they got out of the car looked but the light was to bright and it was to dark to see anything. the location it was seen was empty field woods not to far from the road. the light was a pure white light looks like an led not a warm tone and was pointed right at there car there was also no noise it was just the super bright light.

ps: i have the audio its just a lot of screaming and curse words so i removed it.
content.summary: Super bright lights and round

content.detailedDescription: I was out in the front yard when i heard the sound of a passenger jet which happens often as we live in a rural area that lies along commercial flight paths...I looked up slightly to the north and east and saw a passenger jet heading due west..Then no more than 5 seconds of seeing the passenger jet i saw a fairly bright light slightly west and north of the passenger jet's flight path and it was tracking due south on what appeared to be either a collision or intercept course with the passenger jet..Of course at that point i became extremely focused on this event and wanted to see how this was going to play out...The light stopped extremely close to the passenger jet when the two met on their flight paths...The passenger jet continued west on it's original flight path after passing in front of the south bound light's path...The light at this time is now stationary as the passenger jet flies past it...At this point the light travels a bit south for several seconds and then stops...And then the light accends in a very slight east direction and it kept going until i lost sight of the light. the light appeared to me to leave the earth's atmosphere..At that point i scanned the sky for 10 to 15 minutes to see if i could see anything else of interest. i then went into the house and told my wife about what i had just witnessed
content.summary: Bright viewable light approached pasenger jet...Stopped then changed direction...Accended quickly until it left my sight

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv when i noticed a black object in the sky flying left to right out my window. i watched it and it suddenly came clear it was a triangle. i grabbed my phone to start recording and noticed a highly unusual fluorescent green at one of the edges pulsing randomly. i managed to press record on my phone. as i was recording the first object which was flying out of view, i was absolutely shocked to notice a second object lower in the sky flying behind it. the second object was a doughnut shape. it wobbled as it flew. both objects were black. the second object was much clearer and i could see as it wobbled that there was a hole in the middle. it was shaped exactly like a doughnut. it too had green fluorescent pulses. the second object should have been extremely clear on my camera but when i have watched the footage back, neither object can be seen, however, i noticed on the camera footage that there are 2 other objects moving in the opposite direction at the same height of the first object. these 2 move extremely quickly and are parallel to each other. i did not see these when i was filming.I have sent the footage to a friend who is good with imaging to see if he can pull the objects from the footage. i do not know why they are not apparent in my footage. i have never witnessed anything as incredible as this in my 40 years. this was no standard craft. this was nothing like i believe the military has or anyone else.
content.summary: One triangle flew with fluorescent green pulses followed by a doughnut flying wobbly with green pulses. 2 extremely fast objects in opposite direction during filming these,
